About Me

Hi, I am Helen Chong (they/she). I am a front-end web developer with 8 years of working experience as a graphic designer.

Currently I specialise in front-end web development. I intend to transfer my graphic design experience into web design and web development expertise.

My Certificates:

  • freeCodeCamp's Responsive Web Design Certification
  • freeCodeCamp's JavaScript Algorithms and Data Structures (Beta) Certification
  • freeCodeCamp's Legacy JavaScript Algorithms and Data Structures Certification
  • Chingu Voyage #46 Certificate of Completion
